text: Hassan Ebadi (Persian: حسن عبادی) (born 1986) is an Iranian Strongman, شركتكنندگان در مرحله نهايي مسابقه مردان آهنين مشخص شدندEbadi got the second place in Iran's Strongest Man 2008فيناليست هاي مردان آهنين مشخص شدند competing for Iran in international strongman competitions.مسابقات قویترین مردان جهان از امروز در کیش آغاز می شود He participated four times (2008–2011) in Iran's Strongest Man competition,Ebadi got the second place in Iran's Strongest Man 2008 Mardan Ahanin and could become the Runner-up in 2008. ==See also== *Iran's Strongest Man *World Strongman Cup Federation ==References== ==External links== *قويترين مردان جهان در قشم فاقد اعتبار قانوني است Category:1986 births Category:Living people Category:Iranian powerlifters Category:Iranian strength athletes
title: Hassan Ebadi
